name: For the Revenge
description: The world is filled with darkness by the devil. The last wizard left, you have to shine the light and defeat the devil to save the world. But be careful! As soon as the light is lit, a group of demons will come and attack you. Alone, you have to fight against hundreds of thousands of enemies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual core 2.6 ghz + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS or better Storage: 1 GB available space
